DOC.brief_summary: This is a study of patients who have a high risk of kidney rejection before kidney transplant. The hypothesis is that treatment with a medication called rituximab will make it possible for them to receive a kidney transplant from a donor who previously did not present a good match.
DOC.brief_title: Rituximab Desensitization Therapy for Patients on the Waiting List for Kidney Transplant
DOC.criteria: Active status on a kidney transplant waiting list with positive cross match against a living donor Receipt of a live vaccine within 4 weeks prior to randomization Previous Treatment with Rituximab
